author: Daniel Ortiz-Hernandez
text:
We recently got  a grant to start up a school resource officer program. I'm looking for examples of agreements that municipalities have struck with school districts for such a program. Appreciate any help from others who have gone through this before.
Thanks
title: MOU with schools for SRO
